title: Hotel for Sale
details:
A well functioning hotel with furniture and 60 perches land for immediate sale. The property is conveniently located in well renowned hotel area in the city. Just 2.5 km to the sacred city and 1 km to the city centre. The property consists of 6 air conditioned bedrooms with attached hot water bathrooms, living room, kitchen, large garden area, parking space & garage, driver quarters. Presently running with profit and has a good customer base.
Rs.50 million
